mapper.select:
SELECT A.PYVND, A.CUSNM, A.FACCD, A.YARD, A.SHPTO, A.MKPNO, A.PSPNO, A.ITDSC, A.OUTQY, CAST(F.MOHTQ AS INT) AS LACKCNT, CAST(C.MOHTQ AS INT) AS STOCK1, CAST(D.MOHTQ AS INT) AS STOCK2, CAST(E.MOHTQ AS INT) AS STOCK3
, A.PLNDT${index}
,A.BASQY${index}
FROM(
) A
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT Z.COMPS, SUBSTR(TRIM(Z.ITNBR), 1, LENGTH(TRIM(Z.ITNBR))-1) AS ITNBR, SUM(Z.MOHTQ) AS MOHTQ FROM ${lib2}.BDD100PF Z WHERE Z.COMPS = #{comps} AND SUBSTR(TRIM(Z.ITNBR), LENGTH(TRIM(Z.ITNBR))-1, 1) = '0' GROUP BY Z.COMPS, SUBSTR(TRIM(Z.ITNBR), 1, LENGTH(TRIM(Z.ITNBR))-1) )C ON A.COMPS=C.COMPS AND SUBSTR(TRIM(A.PSPNO), 1, LENGTH(TRIM(A.PSPNO))-1) = C.ITNBR
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT Z.COMPS, SUBSTR(TRIM(Z.ITNBR), 1, LENGTH(TRIM(Z.ITNBR))-1) AS ITNBR, SUM(Z.MOHTQ) AS MOHTQ FROM ${lib2}.BDD100PF Z WHERE Z.COMPS = #{comps} AND SUBSTR(TRIM(Z.ITNBR), LENGTH(TRIM(Z.ITNBR))-1, 1) = '1' GROUP BY Z.COMPS, SUBSTR(TRIM(Z.ITNBR), 1, LENGTH(TRIM(Z.ITNBR))-1) )D ON A.COMPS=D.COMPS AND SUBSTR(TRIM(A.PSPNO), 1, LENGTH(TRIM(A.PSPNO))-1) = D.ITNBR
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT Z.COMPS, SUBSTR(TRIM(Z.ITNBR), 1, LENGTH(TRIM(Z.ITNBR))-1) AS ITNBR, SUM(Z.MOHTQ) AS MOHTQ FROM ${lib2}.BDD100PF Z WHERE Z.COMPS = #{comps} AND SUBSTR(TRIM(Z.ITNBR), LENGTH(TRIM(Z.ITNBR))-1, 1) = '3' GROUP BY Z.COMPS, SUBSTR(TRIM(Z.ITNBR), 1, LENGTH(TRIM(Z.ITNBR))-1) )E ON A.COMPS=E.COMPS AND SUBSTR(TRIM(A.PSPNO), 1, LENGTH(TRIM(A.PSPNO))-1) = E.ITNBR
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COMPS, PSPNO, BASQY AS MOHTQ FROM (SELECT ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY Z.PSPNO ORDER BY Z.PLNDT) AS ROWNUM, Z.COMPS, Z.TYPCD, Z.PYVND, Z.SHPTO, Z.PSPNO,Z.PLNDT, Z.BASQY FROM
PSZDBLIB.SVZ612PF Z
PSZDBLIB.SVZ602PF Z
WHERE Z.COMPS = #{comps} AND Z.PYVND = #{pyvnd} AND Z.PLNDT BETWEEN ${stPlndt} AND ${enPlndt} AND Z.CHGDT = ${plndt}
ORDER BY Z.COMPS, Z.TYPCD, Z.PYVND, Z.SHPTO, Z.PSPNO, Z.PLNDT) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) F ON A.COMPS = F.COMPS AND A.PSPNO = F.PSPNO
WHERE 'SqlMap-NonOrderHostUpList.searchByCondition3' = 'SqlMap-NonOrderHostUpList.searchByCondition3' ORDER BY A.PYVND, A.SHPTO, A.PSPNO
